abstract: There are limits to what you can do on Twitter. And it can take a lot of time.
snippet: There are limits to what you can do on Twitter. And it can take a lot of time.
lead_paragraph: O.K., here’s my deal with Twitter. Personally, I have a hard time doing anything in 140 characters or less. Maybe it’s a difference of the sexes thing. Research tells us more men than women are on Twitter while the Facebook community (which offers free-flowing prose if you choose) is heavier in estrogen. No surprise there really. Men tend to be bottom-liners and women seem to enjoy talking about their experiences more.

headline.main: Don’t Bother Following Me on Twitter
